word_mean_info__list.difference: 主要用于科技领域，指通过思考、研究或实验制造出新的前所未有、极为有用的东西。
多指音乐或诗歌、画的创作。
最普通用词，指任何东西的创作或制造。
侧重创造出来的东西以前并不存在，或者指独具特色的创作。
主要指在艺术或技术领域的创作设计，强调构思多于实际制造。
指产品的生产，或作品创作的完成。
指呈现于整个表面的简单的几何图形或小型图案。
一般指简单的重复图案，或整个装饰的格调或事物的布局，也指由一些相连图形拼成的较大图案。
专指线条、轮廓、图案。强调设计的完美或有秩序。
普通用词，指某人内心产生的想做某事的想法，侧重内心活动。
法律用词，常指某人怀有歹意而犯罪。
多用复数形式，含贬义多指行为不轨的意图。
使用广泛，既可指思想上的计划，又可指任何形式的书面计划或规划。
多指由个人或集体为进行某项工作或完成某一项较大的任务，而制定的计划方案或设想。
普通用词，比plan更强调计划的通盘筹划和某些细节的精心安排。在现代英语中，常用于指阴谋诡计。
最普通常用词，多指事先经过较充分的准备或考虑后制定的计划，也可指非决定性的打算或设想。
从本义蓝图，引申指详细而具体的行动计划。
侧重指按照目标、目的意向，根据固定格式精心作出的计划或安排。
主要指为实现某一阴谋而拟定秘密的计划。

list.abstract: design（英 [dɪˈzaɪn]，美 [dɪˈzaɪn]），英语单词，作名词用，为设计图；设计；目的。作动词用，为设计；专为某种目的（或意图）做。短语搭配有course design（课程设计），例句为“These artist design won an international award.（这些艺术家设计获得国际大奖）”。 design不及物动词类近义词有style、schedule、frame等，名词类近义词有programming、device、pattern，不及物动词类近义词有project、engineer。design的名词形式为designer、designing、designation，过去分词为designed。

design，中文是设计之意，即“设想和计划，设想是目的，计划是过程安排”，通常指有目标和计划的创作行为、活动。在这个竞争激烈的数字化信息时代，企业建立自己的网站已经刻不容缓。无论大、中、小型企业，都决不能被时代所淘汰，所以，建设网站是企业把握时代脉搏，衡量企业是否跟上时代的标准。精明的经营者懂得并擅于用最先进的媒体--互联网，树立企业形象，宣传企业产品。企业建立网站，是企业在网络时代的企业舞台中展现自身实力和寻求发展的重要途径。

yingyinNormal.en: Why don't you sit in on some design classes?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么你不去选修设计课呢？

yingyinNormal.en: He's spent months timing testing his monkey face design.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他花数月时间计时和测试猴脸设计。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna turn it into a showpiece for my clients. Clients of what? Landscape design. Landscape design.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把它变成样品院，向顾客展示。什么顾客？园林设计。园林设计？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't yell at me. I'm not manufacturing. I'm just Web design.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别对我吼啊，我又不是负责生产的，我只负责网页设计。

yingyinNormal.en: It's homicidal by design. Walter kills other hosts all the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本来的设计就是谋杀犯，沃尔特一直都杀其他的接待员。

yingyinNormal.en: Not looking over your shoulder for Veronica. Don't hate. I helped design Veronica.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不必惦记着维罗妮卡。别生气，是我帮着设计了维罗妮卡。

yingyinNormal.en: We need to discuss this. Where? Can I just say this was a stupid design choice?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要谈一谈这个问题。在哪儿？我能说这真是个愚蠢的设计吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Here are the labs where students learn to design and build the doors to the human world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是实验室，学生会学习设计和建造通往人类世界的门。

yingyinNormal.en: Marcus used me to design weapons, to help him realize his vision of a militarized Starfleet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 马库斯利用我设计武器，来帮助他实现使舰队军事化的愿望。

yingyinNormal.en: Anything in engineering or design. I'm not picky or proud. I just want to work here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 工程或者设计方面的工作。我不挑剔，也不自满，我只是想在这里工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Through its taste of design and sturdy construction, you'll have plenty of air for eons to come.
yingyinNormal.zh: 高级品味设计、坚固的结构，未来的日子绝对不怕没有空气。

yingyinNormal.en: The design presumes 500 kilograms of Martian soil and samples. Obviously we won't do that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 设计是要带回500公斤的火星土壤和标本，很明显我们不会那么做。

yingyinNormal.en: Parisians are still debating whether this radical design is the vision of a madman or a genius!
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于这建筑的极端设计，究竟是出自疯子还是天才之手，巴黎人至今仍争论不休！

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry I'm late. I got great news. NASA picked my team's design for the deep field space telescope that's going on the International Space Station this spring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，我来晚了，我有好消息要宣布，NASA选中了我们小组设计的深空太空望远镜，今春天就要把这个设计用在国际空间站上了。

yingyinNormal.en: What? It is not my fault. Why for put Send button right next to Send All? This is just bad design.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？这可不是我的错。你为什么要把发送键放在群发送旁边？这可是不良设计。

yingyinNormal.en: There's no taste, no style. No design. So unless they're shackling you here, why do you stay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里没品位，没风格，也没有设计，所以，除非他们把你绑在这里了，你干嘛还在这儿？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, actually he's the boss. I just pay for everything and design everything, and make everyone look cooler.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，其实他才是老大，我只是...负责付钱和设计，让大家看起来更酷炫。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you need that kind of money for? I have figured out an experimental design that may corroborate my latest thinking on string theory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要这么大一笔钱干什么啊？我想出了一个实验设计可以证实我最新的弦理论想法。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know what he did? He watched me work for ten minutes, and then started to design a simple piece of software that could replace me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道他干了什么吗？他看着我做了10分钟，然后开始设计一个可以取代我的简易软件。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I see your point. So we break down each of the roles into their component parts, and then design specialized tests for each.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我懂你的意思了。所以我们把每个职责需要负责的项目拆分开来，然后为它们设计专门的测量项目。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. （建筑、服装等的）设计方案；设计图；设计；目的；安排；意图；构思；制订；图案

sense_info_list.en: decide upon the look and functioning of (a building, garment, or other object), by making a detailed drawing of it

examination_example.sentence: The readiness of the rats to befriend the social robot was surprising given its minimal <highlight>design</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到它极小的设计，老鼠愿意和社交机器人交朋友令人惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: I took a sewing and <highlight>design</highlight> course thinking that I would move on to a fashion <highlight>design</highlight> course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我学习了一门缝纫和设计课程，以为自己会继续学习一门服装设计课程。

examination_example.sentence: A society <highlight>designed</highlight> with other ends in mind could disturb strikingly different circumstances for the future of labor and leisure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个为其他目的而设计的社会可能会扰乱劳动和休闲未来截然不同的环境。

sense_info_list.en: indicate with a distinctive mark, sign, or name

examination_example.sentence: The supermarket is <highlight>designed</highlight> to lure customers into spending as much time as possible within its doors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这家超市旨在吸引顾客尽可能多地待在店里。

examination_example.sentence: They are <highlight>designed</highlight> to perform very predictable activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们被设计来执行非常可预测的活动。

examination_example.sentence: Our legal system was <highlight>designed</highlight> to set law apart from politics precisely because they are so closely tied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正是因为法律与政治紧密相连，我们的法律体系才旨在将二者区分开。

sense_info_list.en: purpose, planning, or intention that exists or is thought to exist behind an action, fact, or material object

word_affix.word_mean: n. （建筑、服装等的）设计方案

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“计划”，强调按照目标或目的而进行的详细完备的设计、计划，着重强调计划的条理性、完善或完美和谐性。
意为“计划，方案”，表示对细节内容进行系统仔细地选择排列之后做出的计划，有时用表格形式表现出来，还可表示某人的狡猾欺诈或对私利的追求。
意为“规划”，表示通常指各部分区分清晰，比例严格的设计。
意为“项目计划”，强调为试验而提出的工作或研究计划，通常规模较大，有时仅指设想的甚至实际的规划。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. （建筑、服装等的）设计方案；设计图；设计；目的；安排；意图；构思；制订；图案

sense_info_list.en: decide upon the look and functioning of (a building, garment, or other object), by making a detailed drawing of it

examination_example.sentence: The decisions that we make now about the <highlight>design</highlight> of our cities will determine the everyday lives and health of the coming generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在就城市设计所做出的决定将决定子孙后代的日常生活和健康状况。

examination_example.sentence: Other new products in the program have included a kind of full-body blow dryer and specially <highlight>designed</highlight> clothing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该项目中的其他新产品包括一种全身烘干机和专门设计的衣服。

examination_example.sentence: Professors sometimes implement policies <highlight>designed</highlight> to minimize students' use of digital devices, and some instructors even confiscate (没收) tablets and phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教授们有时会实施旨在尽量减少学生使用数字设备的政策，一些教员甚至会没收平板电脑和手机。

sense_info_list.en: purpose, planning, or intention that exists or is thought to exist behind an action, fact, or material object

examination_example.sentence: Although procedures are <highlight>designed</highlight> to guide and support employees' work, employees can't always be expected to comply with procedures that are not seen as useful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管程序旨在指导和支持员工的工作，但不能总是期望员工遵守被认为无用的程序。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement of lines or shapes created to form a pattern or decoration

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. （建筑、服装等的）设计方案；设计图；设计；目的；安排；意图；构思；制订；图案

sense_info_list.en: decide upon the look and functioning of (a building; garment; or other object); by making a detailed drawing of it

examination_example.sentence: A house of a unique <highlight>design</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 设计独特的房子。

examination_example.sentence: She is well informed about the <highlight>design</highlight> business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她对设计行业了如指掌。

examination_example.sentence: Most recognizable of the ship <highlight>designs</highlight> are the ship's smoke stacks, but the fourth stack was actually just artistic in nature and served no functional purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邮船设计中最容易识别的是船舶的烟囱，但第4个烟囱实际上仅仅是艺术装饰，并没有其他功能。

examination_example.sentence: While two of these ships sank, they were all <highlight>designed</highlight> with double hulls (船体) believed to make them "unsinkable", perhaps a mistaken idea that led to the Titanic's and the Britannic's tragic end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管其中两艘邮轮沉没了，但它们都采用了双船体设计，这种双船体被认为能使邮轮“永不沉没”，可能正是这个错误观念导致了泰坦尼克号和不列颠尼克号的惨痛结局。

sense_info_list.en: purpose; planning; or intention that exists or is thought to exist behind an action; fact; or material object

examination_example.sentence: What's needed now is a marketplace platform specifically <highlight>designed</highlight> to bring freelancers and clients together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在需要的是一个专门用于将自由职业者和客户聚集起来的市场平台。

examination_example.sentence: It is a course <highlight>designed</highlight> for students to learn online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一门为学生设计的在线学习课程。

examination_example.sentence: The holiday bonus was <highlight>designed</highlight> to encourage young people to delay getting married in line with China's one-child policy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 节日奖金旨在鼓励年轻人按照中国的独生子女政策推迟结婚。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement of lines or shapes created to form a pattern or decoration

examination_example.sentence: They are relatively uniform in color and <highlight>design</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们在颜色和设计上相对统一。

examination_example.sentence: Our clients usually want a special kind of stone cut in a special <highlight>design</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的客户通常想要一种特殊设计的石头。

sense_info_list.en: indicate with a distinctive mark; sign; or name

word_family.mean: n. （建筑、服装等的）设计方案；设计图；设计；目的；安排；意图；构思；制订；图案

sense_info_list.zh: 设计; 制图; 图案

examination_example.sentence: Any public space has been carefully <highlight>designed</highlight> by an artistic mind to be both functional and beautiful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何公共空间都经过艺术头脑的精心设计，既实用又美观。

examination_example.sentence: I made a difficult decision—leaving my job and studying my <highlight>design</highlight> course full time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我做了个艰难的决定——辞去工作，全心全意学习设计课程。

examination_example.sentence: When my mother saw my creations, she told me how creative my <highlight>designs</highlight> were.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我母亲看到我的作品时，她告诉我我的设计是多么有创意。

sense_info_list.zh: 设计; 计划; 意图

examination_example.sentence: It inspires their creativity in <highlight>designing</highlight> their future career.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它激发了他们在筹划未来职业时的创造力。

examination_example.sentence: Hopefully, all of that is <highlight>designed</highlight> to support humans in their goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 希望所有这些都是为了支持人类实现他们的目标。

examination_example.sentence: In the wild, many cats hunt at night because their eyes are <highlight>designed</highlight> for low light.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在野外，许多猫在夜间捕猎，因为它们的眼睛是专为适应弱光而设计的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. （建筑、服装等的）设计方案；设计图；设计；目的；安排；意图；构思；制订；图案

examination_example.sentence: Because it had special <highlight>design</highlight> and comfortable service.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为它有特殊的设计和舒适的服务。

examination_example.sentence: After the <highlight>design</highlight> changes are made, the illustrator begins creating the final pictures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 设计更改完成后，插画师开始制作最终图片。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Design</highlight> is responsible for this experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 设计负责这种体验。

examination_example.sentence: The study was <highlight>designed</highlight> only for children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究是专为儿童设计的。

examination_example.sentence: But hundreds of years ago-when many people couldn't read-paintings were often <highlight>designed</highlight> to illustrate stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是在几百年前，当许多人不识字的时候，绘画通常是用来描绘故事的。

examination_example.sentence: The new satellite is <highlight>designed</highlight> to work for at most 12 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这颗新卫星被设计为最多工作12年。
